title: Slayer task/Ogres

properties.name: description
properties.value: Ogres can be assigned as a slayer task at level 40 combat by Vannaka. Ogres are most commonly found in Kandarin.

content:
Ogres
Requirements
SkillsNone
Combat level 40
OtherNone
Task Amounts
Vannaka60-120
Advanced data
Icon IDNo

Ogres can be assigned as a slayer task at level 40 combat by Vannaka. Ogres are most commonly found in Kandarin.

Along with ogres and Ogress Warriors and Shamans, Mogres, Zogres, and Skogres can be killed to satisfy the task. Jogres do not count towards the task.

While Zogres and Skogres both have a lower combat level than the rest, players should still take caution, as they are capable of inflicting disease.

Players with 60% Arceuus favour, 40 Magic, ensouled ogre heads, and are on the Arceuus spellbook can kill reanimated ogres.

Monster Variants[edit | edit source]

Safespotting ogres behind the stone wall west of Yanille.

Location Comparison[edit | edit source]

Location Maplink Amount Multicombat Cannonable Safespottable Notes
Chaos Druid Tower Dungeon 7 No Yes Yes This location is fairly unpopulated.
Clock Tower Dungeon 3 No Yes Yes
Combat Training Camp 8 No Yes Yes Requires completion of Biohazard.
Corsair Cove Dungeon 32 No Yes Yes The entrance is a commonly used safespot, so expect to not use it.
Feldip Hills 18 No Yes Yes The ogres in this area are fairly spread out.
Gnome Maze 1 No Yes Yes
God Wars Dungeon 3 Yes Yes No As this is a multicombat area, other monsters will attack you.
Gu'Tanoth 18 No Yes Yes The ogres in this area are secluded in many areas.
Jiggig 11 Yes No No Brutal arrows work best against Zogres and Skogres.
Jiggig dungeon 36 No No Yes Brutal arrows work best against Zogres and Skogres.
Mudskipper Point 3 No Yes Yes Fishing explosives are required to engage in combat with Mogres.
Underground Pass (dungeon) 2 No Yes No Requires completion of Plague City.
West of Yanille 14 No Yes Yes
Wilderness God Wars Dungeon 1 Yes Yes No As this is a multicombat area and in the Wilderness, other monsters and players will attack you.
Witchaven Dungeon 6 No Yes Yes

[[Ogre]]s can be assigned as a [[slayer task]] at level 40 [[combat]] by [[Vannaka]]. Ogres are most commonly found in [[Kandarin]].

Along with ogres and [[Ogress Warrior]]s and [[Ogress Shaman|Shamans]], [[Mogre]]s, [[Zogre]]s, and [[Skogre]]s can be killed to satisfy the task. [[Jogre]]s do '''not''' count towards the task.

While Zogres and Skogres both have a lower combat level than the rest, players should still take caution, as they are capable of inflicting [[disease]].

Players with 60% [[Arceuus]] [[favour]], 40 [[Magic]], [[ensouled ogre head]]s, and are on the [[Arceuus spells|Arceuus spellbook]] can kill [[Reanimated ogre|reanimated ogres]].
